definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: NH3-N and concentration of particles reached lnd standard of sewage treatment plant.
sentences.chinese: 濃度和濁度達到國家一級排放標準。

sentences.english: Conclusion Electromagnetic fields can be used to reduce turbidity value and fluoride in water.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討複合電磁場降低水的渾濁度和除氟功能。

sentences.english: The power is calculated and model is selected by water treatment amounts and turbid degree of inlet and outlet of water.
sentences.chinese: 通過實際處理水量與進出水濁度計算功率和選型。

sentences.english: METHODS Gel clot and kinetic turbidimetric limulus tests were applied.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用凝膠法和動態濁度法鱟試驗。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a turbidimetric assay method to determine Tobramycin sulfate injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的採用濁度法測定硫酸妥布黴素注射液的含量。

sentences.english: Unqualified detected items in secondary water supply primarily were the concentrations of turbidity and iron.
sentences.chinese: 二次供水不合格的檢測項目主要爲渾濁度和鐵。

sentences.english: And for those on the sidelines without a job it's a troubling requirement.
sentences.chinese: 對那些沒有工作的旁觀者來說，這是一個濁度需求。

sentences.english: The ratio between turbidity and the concentration of high-turbidity water of the Huanghe River is not constant.
sentences.chinese: 黃河水的濁度與含沙量之間沒有固定的比值關係。

sentences.english: The stirring with center pipe and flocculate has little effect to the effluent turbidity.
sentences.chinese: 中心管加攪拌以及攪拌絮凝對出水濁度影響甚微。

sentences.english: Stub tube fillers have practical significance for the removal of turbidity.
sentences.chinese: 短管填料對水濁度去除有着重要的實用意義。

sentences.english: Any turbidity in the drinking water is automatically associated with possible wastewater pollution.
sentences.chinese: 飲水中的任何濁度都被自然地聯想到可能是廢水污染。

sentences.english: The study applying scatter light turbidity measurement to design a turbidimeter system.
sentences.chinese: 課題中運用了散射光濁度測量方法來研製濁度儀。

sentences.english: The study applying scatter light turbidity measurement to design a turbidimeter system.
sentences.chinese: 課題中運用了散射光濁度測量方法來研製濁度儀。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a turbidimetric method for the contents determination of minocycline hydrochloride capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立濁度法測定鹽酸米諾環素膠囊的效價。

sentences.english: Turbidity reflected the content of insoluble aggregates contained in protein.
sentences.chinese: 濁度反映了蛋白中不溶性聚集體的含量。
